sect1.title: Manage groups
sect1.para: A group is a set of user affiliated with the forge project, or a particular project.

sect2.title: Create a group
sect2.para: In section«Project administration/Your memberships/Your groups», press the «Create a group» button, fill requested informations and then click the button «Create the group».

sect2.title: Forge group
sect2.para: A forge group may represent a cross-functional team affiliated with several projects (architects group, validation team, administration of computer equipment, etc.)..

Groups created at forge level can be defined as global groups ie they can be added to any project or as simple groups ie having as scope the project forge only. This by activating or desactivating the check box «Make it public».

sect2.title: Project group
sect2.para: A project group may represent a subset of people coherant in their roles on the project (technical managers with roles "developer" and "architect", integrators with roles "publication" and "validation", trainees, etc..). Groups created in a project can not be added to other project.
